Text:
This is one of the best copies of the Blond Ambition Tour. It is dubbed directly from a like Very Good condition VHS of the Japan Concert.

This is dubbed to DVD format as an ISO image.

Blond Ambition has never been released on DVD.

This is not the crappy Japan lazer disc or HBO VHS version.

Please seed for Maddy

And we will buy the DVD when they finally do release it. :-) 

Please do buy copies of Madonna CDs and DVDs. I preview via torrent then I pay my dues for the hard copy.

Be sure to check out this rare out of print
CD of Open Your Heart, Singles Remixes.

10 minute version of Open Your Heart

http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8525008/Madonna_-Open_Your_Heart_-_Single_remixes-10_min_version

And PLEASE buy all Madonna's CD and DVDs to support her.

These are previews and not in print.
